item.title: By: Judith
item.dc:creator: Judith
item.description: <p>Matt & I got a book to fill in on our Family History, so anything you find we may use too. After such a wonderful day yesterday I look like a lobster, standing watching Matt play football for his last game of the season, I slowly went red! but now am brown, at indoor cricket a lady asked "Have you been on holiday?" my answer was no just watching a footy match and then sitting in a beer garden at the Sorrell Horse. Lets hope Mum & Dad get good weather on their hol's and have a lovely time, take care on your trip.</p>
item.content:encoded: Matt & I got a book to fill in on our Family History, so anything you find we may use too. After such a wonderful day yesterday I look like a lobster, standing watching Matt play football for his last game of the season, I slowly went red! but now am brown, at indoor cricket a lady asked “Have you been on holiday?” my answer was no just watching a footy match and then sitting in a beer garden at the Sorrell Horse. Lets hope Mum & Dad get good weather on their hol’s and have a lovely time, take care on your trip.

item.title: By: Fi
item.dc:creator: Fi
item.description: <p>If you need any help with your historical research let me know! The Public Records Office have quite a lot on-line but it might be more dificult to get hold of the Irish stuff.</p>
item.content:encoded: If you need any help with your historical research let me know! The Public Records Office have quite a lot on-line but it might be more dificult to get hold of the Irish stuff.
